title: Hotels in Hyderabad Gachibowli Welcome Guests with Warmth (Kirti Sharma)
text: By Kirti Sharma Sep 11, 2015 Hyderabad with its royal heritage and its priceless legacy of pristine pearls, fragrant biryanis, the famous Charminar and other monuments, mausoleums, manicured parks and artificial dams, makes for a scenic destination for a leisurely family sojourn, exploring its rich cultural heritage and culinary and other delights. Delightful hotels in Hyderabad Gachibowli have sprung up with a plethora of privileges to tempt the savvy traveler and grant him traditional hospitality. Hotels near Gachibowli Indoor Stadium , with their richly furnished and well endowed air-conditioned rooms with ensuite washrooms and premium toiletries for your exclusive use, offer the discerning traveler with ample accommodation options to select his preferred mode of occupancy. With a munificent m√©lange of almost 190 spacious rooms and lavish suites to choose from, you can opt for superior rooms, deluxe rooms, executive rooms, the exclusive executive suite and the palatial presidential suite.However before you check in to your amazingly comfortable accommodation and unwind, let us first explore some of the other fulsome facilities that this elegant hotel has to offer its valued guests. With an eclectic Pan-Asian restaurant that offers you an exciting array of oriental street food from exotic and far flung countries such as Thailand, Vietnam, Singapore, Cambodia, Indonesia and Myanmar and a multi-cuisine coffee shop with regional specialties and "Ghar ka khana" your gastronomic needs are fulfilled with ease!These hospitable hotels in Hyderabad Gachibowli also have a lot more on offer for the discerning guest from an efficient and well-equipped business centre to a sophisticated spa with its rejuvenating therapies at the hands of experienced masseurs and beauty experts, an inviting swimming pool to swim invigorating lengths and so on and so forth!And now back to those deliciously air-conditioned and exquisitely designed rooms and suites with their ample in-room amenities. While the palatial presidential suite at the opulent end of the scale, with its two bedrooms and a separate sitting room with dining area, designed for high-end comfort and luxurious living, comes with a Jacuzzi and in-room microwave, an electronic safe and mini-bar, other "freebies" include a Wi-Fi and tea/coffee maker for that instantly energizing hot cuppa.Other more compact but comfortable and moderately priced accommodation includes the sophisticated deluxe room with vibrant furnishings and artwork and the more businesslike but efficient executive room , both endowed with the option of king or twin beds and in-room luxuries like Wi-Fi, electronic safe, well stocked mini bar and a handy tea/coffee maker. The executive room also has the additional advantage of an in-room microwave, in case you want a hot and appetizing snack at any time.Hospitable hotels in Hyderabad, with their modern fitness center where you can carry out an invigorating workout or premium sedan cars which can transport you in style for a business appointment or sightseeing tour, make sure you always do things in style.
